title: Thailand’s household debt reaches 16-year high
dc:creator: Arno Maierbrugger
description:
Thailand’s households are struggling with the highest level of debt in 16 years, according to a new survey by the University of the Thai Chamber of Commerce published on August 26. The situation is mainly owing to the prolonged Covid-19

The post Thailand’s household debt reaches 16-year high appeared first on Investvine.
